mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customermng.tb_customer (customer_name, gender, address, phone_number, customer_email, hobby, purchase_intention, bank_account, duty, company_name, company_email, delete_flag, create_time, delete_time) VALUES (#{customerName}, #{gender}, #{address}, #{phoneNumber}, #{customerEmail}, #{hobby}, #{purchaseIntention}, #{bankAccount}, #{duty}, #{companyName}, #{companyEmail}, false, current_timestamp(), null);
mapper.update: UPDATE customermng.tb_customer AS c INNER JOIN (SELECT customer_id FROM customermng.tb_customer WHERE customer_name = #{customerName}) AS tmp ON c.customer_id = tmp.customer_id SET c.customer_id = CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), '%m%d'),LPAD(tmp.customer_id , 4, '0')) WHERE c.customer_name = #{customerName};
